tit.j: 舞鶴港とれとれセンター

sen.j: 舞鶴港とれとれセンター（まいづるこうとれとれセンター）は、京都府舞鶴市にある舞鶴港で水揚げされた魚介類や、丹後地方の名産品を販売する観光施設。
sen.e: Located in Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture, Maizuru Port Toretore Center is a tourist facilitiy that sells fish and seafood from Maizuru Port and local branded products in Tango area.
Located in Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture, Maizuru Port Toretore Center is a tourist facility that sells fish and seafood from Maizuru Port and local products from the Tango area.
Located in Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture, Maizuru Port Toretore Center is a tourist facility that sells fish and seafood from Maizuru Port and local products from the Tango area.

sen.j: 舞鶴港とれとれセンターは京都府内最大の水産基地として日本海の豊富な海の幸を提供している舞鶴港に位置している。
sen.e: Maizuru Port Toretore Center is at Maizuru Port which produces seafood in abundance from the Sea of Japan as the largest fish industry center in Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Port Toretore Center is at Maizuru Port which produces seafood in abundance from the Sea of Japan and is the largest fish industry center in Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Port Toretore Center is at Maizuru Port which produces seafood in abundance from the Sea of Japan and is the largest fish industry center in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: センター内では魚介類の他にも地元でとれる野菜や、お土産などを販売しており、また道の駅として交通情報なども提供している。
sen.e: It sells local produce and souvenirs other than seafood, and there is also a Michi no Eki (a roadside rest area with a market of local products for tourists) which also provides traffic and travel information.

It sells local produce and souvenirs other than seafood, and there is also a Michi no Eki (a roadside rest area with a market of local products for tourists) which also provides traffic and travel information.

It sells local produce and souvenirs other than seafood, and there is also a Michi no Eki (a roadside rest area with a market of local products for tourists) which also provides traffic and travel information.
Shokusen-dokoro Ichikura (食鮮処 一蔵) (Seafood Restaurant Ichikura)
Shokusen-dokoro Ichikura (食鮮処 一蔵) (Seafood Restaurant Ichikura)

sen.j: れすとらん高砂 舞鶴郷

tit.j: 道の駅舞鶴港とれとれセンター
tit.e: Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center
Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center
Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center

sen.j: 2002年（平成14年）8月13日に、道の駅舞鶴港とれとれセンターとして道の駅に登録され、道路情報施設や休憩施設としても機能している。
sen.e: On August 13, 2002, it was registered as Michi no Eki named 'Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center', and works also as a traffic information center and a rest area.
On August 13, 2002, it was registered as a Michi no Eki called 'Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center', and works also as a traffic information center and a rest area.
On August 13, 2002, it was registered as a Michi no Eki called 'Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center,' and works also as a traffic information center and a rest area.
sen.cmt: カンマの位置を変更しました。
「cars」→「vehicles」,I assume that this can include buses, vans and minibuses so it would be better as 'vehicles'.

sen.e: Capacity exclusively for the disabled: 4 cars

sen.j: 便所 （いずれも24時間利用可能）

sen.cmt: 大 5器、小 19器→5 toilets, 19 urinals[定訳不明]

sen.j: ファーマーズマーケット道の駅「あぐり」
西日本旅客鉄道 舞鶴線 西舞鶴駅または北近畿タンゴ鉄道 北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線 四所駅下車
sen.e: Get off at Nishi Maizuru Station of JR Maizuru Line, or at Shisho Station of Miyazu Line, Kitakinki Tango Railway.
Get off at Nishi Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line, or at Shisho Station on the Miyazu Line on the Kitakinki Tango Railway.
Get off at Nishi-Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line, or at Shisho Station on the Miyazu Line on the Kitakinki Tango Railway.

sen.j: 舞鶴観光周遊バスで、道の駅・舞鶴港とれとれセンター前下車すぐ。
sen.e: Take Maizuru Sightseeing Bus and get off at 'Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center Mae' bus stop, which is very close to it.
sen.cmt: 舞鶴観光周遊バス→Maizuru Sightseeing Bus（舞鶴観光周遊バス）[定訳不明]
sen.e: Take the Maizuru Sightseeing Bus and get off at 'Michi no Eki Maizuru Port Toretore Center Mae' bus stop, which is very close to the center.
